name: Monsters Are Weak to GUNS
description:
Complete 5 simple, yet deceptively difficult stages, and defeat the BLOOD HAVOK and destroy the monsters from their source.

How, you may ask? With a GUN!

Upgrade your gun, upgrade your sparse healing items, and try not to run out of bullets, as the only thing worse than having 1 bullet is having none.

Features randomly generated adventures and varied music!

-------------------------------------------

The LITE version allows upgrades to be persistent across runs. This allows for easy cheesing and under 3-minute runs, and 10 minute adventures. Consider this the "easy" version of the game.

The LIKE version resets ALL progress upon death, including upgrades and purchases. This forces you to learn from your mistakes, and allows for 4 minute runs and 30 minute adventures. Consider this the "hard" version of the game.
